meanings.sent1: The multipronged fork was perfect for picking up spaghetti.
meanings.sent2: The tree had a multipronged trunk that split into many branches.
meanings.sent3: The multipronged comb tangled in her hair, causing a funny situation.
meanings.sent4: His multipronged strategy in the game led to victory from unexpected angles.
meanings.sent5: The multipronged starfish had arms reaching out in all directions.

meanings.sent1: Her multipronged project required teamwork from different departments.

meanings.sent4: The multipronged investigation uncovered layers of deception within the organization.
